resources.string:
Hello, my name is Sulushash. 

I was born in Astana and I am 18 years old. 

Currently, I'm second year student of Astana IT University. My major is media technologist. 
In my family there are 5 person, I am first infant. 

I like reading fascinating books and listen to classic musics. 
And sometimes I even write short poems on my notebook. 
When feel down, I try to spend time with my family and friends. 

Now my english language has grown to Upper-Intermediate level. 

But I hope I'll progress my english language to the next level. 
And I would like to invite you for participating in english lessons.
